Dispite it's low power and toughness, (which can be made up for) I really like this card. When it comes into play, distory target non-creature, when it is blocked or blocks, distory creature. In short, it's a versitile card. I like it. Just protect it well and it should be devistating.

Posted By: PaladinOfSunhome (7/28/2009 3:13:12 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Good card, but most effective if you can mana ramp to get it out early to destroy a land.   
(G)(1) is around something good to pay for to destroy target artifact, enchantment. (example. Naturalize)  
(G)(2) is also a good cost for a 2/2 deathtouch.  
And able to destroy a land is amazing too, but is very noneffective late game...
posts.html:
